1.0.name: wordpress/persian-world
1.0.description:
This plugin, will turn WordPress [en] into Persian .

Features :

  • "Fully compatible with latest WordPress version
  • "Fully UTF-8 conversion.
  • "Adds two buttons to the TinyMCE editor [LTR and RTL directions.]

Includes :

  • Default MO file [fa_IR]
  • Admin MO file [admin-fa_IR]
  • Admin-network MO file [admin-network-fa_IR]
